full_text:

>   I'm thinking there is faces embedded in sound, it's related to speech,
> and not just EVP. It seems to be a normal function of our own minds(living
> or dead), the same as reverse speech. I found some faces in old EVPs from
> boxes and also in music files. The ones from Evanescence are pretty
> impressive in person, and do not seem to be intentionaly embedded.
>
>  I know, it's not ghost hunters, and most don't want to have to think.
> I think most want this stuff in a neat little box, all well defined, all
> rules and protocols known, but it just won't stay in one box, or universe
> for that matter.
>
>  Frank-S
